00048    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00049    class AutoCorr : public ParamComposite
00050    {
00051    
00052    public:
00053   
00057       AutoCorr();
00058    
00062       void clear();
00063    
00069       void readParam(std::istream& in);
00070    
00076       void setParam(int bufferCapacity);
00077 
00083       void sample(Data value);
00084    
00090       void output(std::ostream& out);
00091   
00095       int bufferCapacity() const;
00096  
00100       int nSample() const;
00101  
00105       Data average() const; 
00106       
00110       double corrTime() const; 
00111 
00117       Product autoCorrelation(int t) const;
00118 
00125       void pack(char*& current, char* end) const;
00126 
00133       void unpack(char*& current, char* end);
00134        
00140       int packedSize() const;
00141 
00148       template <class Archive>
00149       void serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version);
00150 
00151    private:
00152    
00153       // Ring buffer containing a sequence of stored Data values.
00154       RingBuffer<Data>  buffer_; 
00155    
00156       // Array in which corr[j] = sum of values of <x(i-j), x(i)>
00157       DArray<Product>  corr_;
00158    
00159       // Array in which nCorr[i] = number of values added to corr[i]
00160       DArray<int>      nCorr_;
00161    
00162       // Sum of all previous values of x(t)
00163       Data        sum_;
00164    
00165       // Physical capacity (# of elements) of buffer, corr, and nCorr
00166       int         bufferCapacity_;
00167       
00168       // Total number of previous values of x(t)
00169       int         nSample_;
00170    
00174       void allocate();
00175 
00179       bool isValid();
00180 
00181    };
00182 
00183    /*
00184    * Default constructor.
00185    */
00186    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00187    AutoCorr<Data, Product>::AutoCorr() 
00188     : buffer_(),
00189       corr_(),
00190       nCorr_(),
00191       bufferCapacity_(0),
00192       nSample_(0)
00193    { setToZero(sum_); }
00194    
00195    /*
00196    * Read buffer capacity and allocate all required memory.
00197    */
00198    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00199    void AutoCorr<Data, Product>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00200    {
00201       readBegin(in, "AutoCorr");
00202 
00203       read<int>(in, "capacity", bufferCapacity_);
00204       allocate();
00205 
00206       readEnd(in);
00207    }
00208    
00209    /*
00210    * Set buffer capacity and initialize.
00211    */
00212    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00213    void AutoCorr<Data, Product>::setParam(int bufferCapacity)
00214    {
00215       bufferCapacity_ = bufferCapacity;
00216       allocate();
00217    }
00218    
00219    /*
00220    * Set previously allocated to initial empty state.
00221    */
00222    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00223    void AutoCorr<Data, Product>::clear()
00224    {   
00225       setToZero(sum_);
00226       nSample_ = 0;
00227 
00228       if (bufferCapacity_ > 0) {
00229          for (int i=0; i < bufferCapacity_; ++i) {
00230             setToZero(corr_[i]);
00231             nCorr_[i] = 0;
00232          }
00233          buffer_.clear();
00234       }
00235    }
00236    
00237    /*
00238    * Allocate arrays and CyclicBuffer, and initialize.
00239    */
00240    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00241    void AutoCorr<Data, Product>::allocate()
00242    {  
00243       if (bufferCapacity_ > 0) {
00244          corr_.allocate(bufferCapacity_);
00245          nCorr_.allocate(bufferCapacity_);
00246          buffer_.allocate(bufferCapacity_);
00247       }
00248       clear();
00249    }
00250    
00251    /*
00252    * Are capacities consistent?
00253    */
00254    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00255    bool AutoCorr<Data, Product>::isValid()
00256    {  
00257       bool valid = true;
00258       if (bufferCapacity_ != corr_.capacity()) valid = false;
00259       if (bufferCapacity_ != nCorr_.capacity()) valid = false;
00260       if (bufferCapacity_ != buffer_.capacity()) valid = false;
00261       if (!valid) {
00262          UTIL_THROW("Invalid AutoCorr");
00263       }
00264       return valid;
00265    }
00266    
00267    /*
00268    * Sample a single value from a time sequence.
00269    */
00270    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00271    void AutoCorr<Data, Product>::sample(Data value)
00272    {
00273       ++nSample_;
00274       sum_ += value;
00275       buffer_.append(value);
00276       for (int i=0; i < buffer_.size(); ++i) {
00277          corr_[i] += product(buffer_[i], value);
00278          ++nCorr_[i];
00279       };
00280    }
00281    
00282    /*
00283    * Return capacity of history buffer.
00284    */
00285    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00286    int AutoCorr<Data, Product>::bufferCapacity() const
00287    { return bufferCapacity_; }
00288 
00289    /*
00290    * Return number of values sampled thus far.
00291    */
00292    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00293    int AutoCorr<Data, Product>::nSample() const
00294    { return nSample_; }
00295 
00296    /*
00297    * Return average of sampled values.
00298    */
00299    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00300    Data AutoCorr<Data, Product>::average() const
00301    {
00302       Data ave  = sum_;
00303       ave /= double(nSample_);
00304       return ave;
00305    }
00306 
00307    /*
00308    * Final output
00309    */
00310    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00311    void AutoCorr<Data, Product>::output(std::ostream& outFile) 
00312    {
00313       Data    ave;
00314       Product autocorr;
00315       Product aveSq;
00316    
00317       // Calculate and output average of sampled values
00318       ave  = sum_;
00319       ave /= double(nSample_);
00320       aveSq = product(ave, ave);
00321   
00322       // Calculate and output autocorrelation
00323       for (int i = 0; i < buffer_.size(); ++i) {
00324          autocorr = corr_[i]/double(nCorr_[i]);
00325          autocorr = autocorr - aveSq;
00326          outFile << Int(i);
00327          write<Product>(outFile, autocorr);
00328          outFile << std::endl;
00329       }
00330       
00331    }
00332    
00333    /*
00334    *  Return correlation time in unit of sampling interval  
00335    */
00336    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00337    double AutoCorr<Data, Product>::corrTime() const
00338    {
00339       Data    ave;
00340       Product aveSq, variance, autocorr, sum;
00341       int     size;
00342       
00343       size = buffer_.size();
00344    
00345       // Calculate average sampled values
00346       ave   = sum_/double(nSample_);
00347       ave  /= double(nSample_);
00348       aveSq = product(ave, ave);
00349 
00350       // Calculate variance sampled values
00351       variance = corr_[0]/double(nCorr_[0]);
00352       variance = variance - aveSq;
00353 
00354       setToZero(sum);
00355       for (int i = 1; i < size/2; ++i) {
00356          autocorr = corr_[i]/double(nCorr_[i]);
00357          autocorr = autocorr - aveSq;
00358          sum     += autocorr;  
00359       }
00360       sum = sum/variance;
00361       
00362       return sum; 
00363    }
00364   
00370    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00371    Product AutoCorr<Data, Product>::autoCorrelation(int t) const
00372    {
00373       Data    ave;
00374       Product autocorr;
00375       Product aveSq;
00376    
00377       // Calculate average of sampled values
00378       ave  = sum_;
00379       ave /= double(nSample_);
00380       aveSq = product(ave, ave);
00381   
00382       // Calculate and return autocorrelation
00383       assert(t < buffer_.size());
00384       autocorr = corr_[t]/double(nCorr_[t]);
00385       autocorr = autocorr - aveSq;
00386 
00387       return autocorr;
00388    }
00389 
00390    /*
00391    * Pack this AutoCorr into a memory block.
00392    */
00393    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00394    void AutoCorr<Data, Product>::pack(char*& current, char* end) const
00395    {
00396       if (current + packedSize() > end) {
00397          UTIL_THROW("Attempted write past end of send buffer");
00398       }
00399       buffer_.pack(current, end);
00400       
00401       corr_.pack(current, end);
00402       
00403       nCorr_.pack(current, end);
00404       
00405       Data* ptr = (Data *)(current);
00406       *ptr = sum_;
00407       current = (char*)(ptr + 1);
00408       
00409       int* ptr0 = (int*)(current);
00410       *ptr0 = bufferCapacity_;
00411       ++ptr0;
00412       *ptr0 = nSample_;
00413       ++ptr0;
00414       current = (char*)(ptr0);
00415    }
00416 
00417    /*
00418    * Unpack this AutoCorr from a memory block.
00419    */
00420    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00421    void AutoCorr<Data, Product>::unpack(char*& current, char* end) 
00422    {
00423       if (current + packedSize() > end) {
00424          UTIL_THROW("Attempted read past end of recv buffer");
00425       }
00426       buffer_.unpack(current, end);
00427       
00428       corr_.unpack(current, end);
00429       
00430       nCorr_.unpack(current, end);
00431       
00432       Data* ptr = (Data *)(current);
00433       sum_ = *ptr;
00434       current = (char*)(ptr + 1);
00435       
00436       int* ptr0 = (int*)(current);
00437       bufferCapacity_ = *ptr0;
00438       ++ptr0;
00439       nSample_ = *ptr0;
00440       ++ptr0;
00441       current = (char*)(ptr0);
00442    }
00443 
00444    /*
00445    * Return packed sizeof this AutoCorr, in bytes.
00446    */
00447    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00448    int AutoCorr<Data, Product>::packedSize() const
00449    {
00450       int size;
00451       size = buffer_.packedSize() + corr_.packedSize() + nCorr_.packedSize(); 
00452       size = size + sizeof(Data) + 2*sizeof(int);
00453       return size;
00454    }

00456    /*
00457    * Serialize this AutoCorr.
00458    */
00459    template <typename Data, typename Product>
00460    template <class Archive>
00461    void AutoCorr<Data, Product>::serialize(Archive& ar, 
00462                                            const unsigned int version)
00463    {
00464       ar & buffer_;
00465       ar & corr_;
00466       ar & nCorr_;
00467       ar & sum_;
00468       ar & bufferCapacity_;
00469       ar & nSample_;
00470       isValid();
00471    }
